text: Bar akongezir arazir kam, tein bizim? A gumazir uan mɨkarzir mogomebar aghorezibar bizimra? O, gumazir mɨkarzir mogomebar aghorezir puvatɨziba uaghan, men bizim? Ia deravɨra nɨghnɨgh. E kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Abraham nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, ezɨ God an nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bagha a dɨbora ghaze, nɨ nan damazimɨn dera.”
